import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card' import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col' import './Item-list.css' const ItemCard = ({ _id, name, imageUrl, deleteItem }) => { console.log('ID DE LA CARTA', _id) return ( < Col md={4} > {name}
{/* showUpdateModal(_id)} > */}
deleteItem(_id)}>
 ) } export default ItemCard
